Package aom.scripting.ui.console

Class Mode

Object
Mode
public class Mode
extends Object
This class provides a collection of Console commands concerning Game Modes (not to be confused with edit modes). An (incomplete?) list of modes and submodes:
  • Simulation
    • SinglePlayer
    • GameMenu
    • PostGame
    • Editor
    • ScenarioTest
    • RecordGame
    • Cinematic
    • CinematicBuild
    • HotKeySetup
    • Options
  • PreGame / PreGameUI
    • HotKeySetup
    • Options
    • ModManager (Steam Workshop in AoM:EE)
  • Campaign
  • Arena
  • SinglePlayerSetup
  • ProfileSelect
  • MPSession
    • Menu
    • QuickTeam
    • Broadcast
    • Receive
  • RM Setup
Author:
Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com
Local Call
[@local Mode commands are all local.]
See Also:
Console.editMode(string)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void enterRecordGameMode​(string name)
    Enter the mode used to play recorded games.
    void modeEnter​(string mode)
    Enters the named mode.
    void subModeClear​(string mode)
    Leaves all active submodes of the named mode.
    void subModeEnter​(string mode, string subMode)
    Enters the named submode (of the main mode).
    void subModeLeave​(string mode, string subMode)
    Leaves the named submode (of the main mode).
    void subModeToggle​(string mode, string subMode)
    Changes the state of the named submode (of the main mode).
    void subModeToggleBetween​(string mode, string subMode1, string subMode2)
    Toggles between the two submodes (of the main mode).
    void subModeToggleBetweenIfNotMP​(string mode, string subMode1, string subMode2)
    Toggles between the two submodes (of the main mode), but only if we're not in a multiplayer game.
    void subModeToggleIfNotMP​(string mode, string subMode)
    Changes the state of the named submode (of the main mode), but only if we're not in a multiplayer game.

    Methods inherited from class Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • enterRecordGameMode

      public void enterRecordGameMode​(string name)
      Enter the mode used to play recorded games. Don't expect this to work properly.

    • modeEnter

      public void modeEnter​(string mode)
      Enters the named mode.

    • subModeEnter

      public void subModeEnter​(string mode, string subMode)
      Enters the named submode (of the main mode).

    • subModeLeave

      public void subModeLeave​(string mode, string subMode)
      Leaves the named submode (of the main mode).

    • subModeClear

      public void subModeClear​(string mode)
      Leaves all active submodes of the named mode.

    • subModeToggle

      public void subModeToggle​(string mode, string subMode)
      Changes the state of the named submode (of the main mode).

    • subModeToggleIfNotMP

      public void subModeToggleIfNotMP​(string mode, string subMode)
      Changes the state of the named submode (of the main mode), but only if we're not in a multiplayer game.

    • subModeToggleBetween

      public void subModeToggleBetween​(string mode, string subMode1, string subMode2)
      Toggles between the two submodes (of the main mode).

    • subModeToggleBetweenIfNotMP

      public void subModeToggleBetweenIfNotMP​(string mode, string subMode1, string subMode2)
      Toggles between the two submodes (of the main mode), but only if we're not in a multiplayer game.
